duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service and exceed customer expectations during each visit.
Handle cash transactions and manage fuel transactions.
Stock and maintain inventory, including foodservice items.
Prep food and adhere to foodservice safety guidelines for designated positions.
Maintain a clean and safe store environment for customers.
Promote rewards loyalty program and handle point-of-sale transactions.
Multi-task and perform repeated bending, standing, reaching, and occasional lifting up to 50 pounds.
